eecs.jago.element
Interface Reflective

All Superinterfaces:
ReflectiveColors
All Known Implementing Classes:
ColoredLine
public interface Reflective
extends ReflectiveColors

A Reflective object will appear to reflect lighting. Implementing this interface will allow objects with sensors to detect the reflection. Useful for sensors such as the Lego Mindstorms standard Light sensor.

Since:
4.1

Field Summary
static int MAX_REFLECTION
          The maximum amount of reflected light.
static int MIN_REFLECTION
          The minimum amount of reflected light

Method Detail

setReflection

public void setReflection(int level)
Sets the level of reflected light by any class that implements this interface.

Parameters:
level - The level of reflected light, between MIN_REFLECTION and MAX_REFLECTION, inclusively.

getReflection

public int getReflection()
Returns the level of reflection of light.

Returns:
The amount of reflected light.
